data.message: Everyone's so pissed at him for dissing Trump. He's dissed presidents before. Try listening to Mosh and White America, haters ✌

replies.message: He only bashed presidents with a R next to their name. But skips over dems who have done the same b.s. as the ones he bashed.  No talks of going to war in a couple countries illegally, under our previous president. No talks of him being dubbed deporter in chief. Or dropping more bombs than any other president. But they are "buddies"
